articles.description: Gen Con is back with the best new board games and RPGs. We’ll cover everything from Dungeons & Dragons to Disney Lorcana, sharing the best of what’s new in tabletop.
articles.content:
From Dungeons & Dragons to Disney Lorcana, well share the best of whats new in tabletop
The best four days in gaming are bigger than ever this year with loads of big new titles debuting on the s… [+289 chars]
